main event: A single orange object was observed in Rantoul, Illinois, on 6 June 1962.
interesting points: The object exhibited a pulsating motion and flickering effect., The sighting lasted for 4-5 minutes., The object was at an altitude of approximately 2000-3000 feet., The observer used binoculars to track the object., The object moved erratically and disappeared quickly from view.
witness description: James A Ranch, a ground power instructor at Chanute AFB, generally reliable.
